mapper.select: SELECT name, NVL(cnt, 0) AS total_count, domain FROM SCHOOL LEFT JOIN ( SELECT school_id, COUNT(*) cnt FROM member where account_status != 0 GROUP BY school_id) b ON SCHOOL.school_id = b.school_id
SELECT s.* FROM SCHOOL s INNER JOIN MEMBER m ON s.SCHOOL_ID = m.SCHOOL_ID WHERE m.user_id =#{user_id}
